about_the_game:
Game Master Edition Features & Content:

  • Host game sessions for anyone to join.
  • Create as many map save files as you want.
  • Make use of the in game pin system. This let's you drop a pin anywhere in your map and make a reference to a different map you have created. You can then warp between maps with just a couple of clicks!
  • Unlock future updates for campaign management. (Announcements Coming Soon)
  • Unlock future DLC packs as well as the already included ones shown below.

Crusader Castle: 168 Assets

Fantastic Dungeon: 203 Assets

Forge Dungeon: 104 Assets

Greenwood Village: 65 Assets

Lab Dungeon: 33 Assets

Orc Pack: 88 Assets

Underwater Pack: 121 Assets



Total DLC Assets So Far: 782

Free Edition:

  • Are not able to host their own multiplayer games. They must instead join the lobby of someone who owns the Game Master Edition.
  • Are only given one save slot for single-player maps.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Unlock full GM control for Game Master Engine. Create unlimited maps and host sessions for others to join plus more!
